::Koga Shuko turned as his business partner Set spoke to him::
"The Oblitercons are dangerous.  They destroyed all records of the gestalt 
technology that took two hundred years to crack!  I say we just get our 
technology, and kill them.  As for the energon, it will make us ten times as 
rich."

::Koga studied a stellar map presented by his ship that had shot the 
Oblitercons down over this planet::
"Earth, in the past.  The crown jewel of this entire solar system.  Our 
ancestors drained energy from it, and nearly destroyed it a few times.  
Before we do anything, we must take the Ark.  Any damage those fools did 
could ultimately destroy Cybertron, and me with it.  And that's not 
acceptable!" 
::Koga Shuko was a rich Predacon, owner of PredTech Labs, he didn't love 
money as much as Set, he loved power::
"Very well, Killer.  Land in...oh let's see...what will soon be Egypt, near 
the area where the pyramids will be built.  I've always been fascinated by 
the fact that those pathetic Humans could build such masterpieces."

::A robot stepped from the shadows, two inwardly pointing horns on his head::

::Light shined on Shuko's silver, black, and red face, his crimson optics 
looking to the robot in the shadows::
"Unitron, prepare the men.  We w-ARGH!" 
::Shuko fell to his chest from his command chair, the entire ship buckling 
from an unknown source::
